english.segment1: V1You are perfect, in all the things that you do You are the only, hope that I can run to Chorus I want to be where you are I want to see what you see I want to love like you love I want be. V2 The poor and the broken, you call them your friendsThe lost and the lonely, you are right there with themBridge The Greatest Love I've Ever Known That You Would Call Me Your Own
